verses.text: Again, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* gathered \w together|strong="H0622"\w* all \add the\add* \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* \add men\add* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* with all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* with him from Baale of \w Judah|strong="H1184"\w*, to bring \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from thence the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* is \w called|strong="H7121"\w* by the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* that \w dwelleth|strong="H3427"\w* \add between\add* the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w*.\f + \fr 6.2 \ft Baale: or, Baalah, that is, Kirjath-jearim\f*\f + \fr 6.2 \ft whose name…: or, at which the name, even the name of the \+nd LORD\+nd* of hosts, was called upon\f*

And they \w set|strong="H7392"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* upon a \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w cart|strong="H5699"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H5375"\w* it out of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Abinadab|strong="H0041"\w* that \add was\add* in \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*: and \w Uzzah|strong="H5798"\w* and \w Ahio|strong="H0283"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Abinadab|strong="H0041"\w*, \w drave|strong="H5090"\w* the \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w cart|strong="H5699"\w*.\f + \fr 6.3 \ft set: Heb. made to ride\f*\f + \fr 6.3 \ft Gibeah: or, the hill\f*

And they \w brought|strong="H5375"\w* it out of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Abinadab|strong="H0041"\w* which \add was\add* at \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w*, \w accompanying|strong="H5973"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: and \w Ahio|strong="H0283"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*.\f + \fr 6.4 \ft accompanying: Heb. with\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w played|strong="H7832"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* on all manner of \add instruments made of\add* \w fir|strong="H1265"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, even on \w harps|strong="H3658"\w*, and on \w psalteries|strong="H5035"\w*, and on \w timbrels|strong="H8596"\w*, and on \w cornets|strong="H4517"\w*, and on \w cymbals|strong="H6767"\w*.

¶ And when they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Nachon’s|strong="H5225"\w* \w threshingfloor|strong="H1637"\w*, \w Uzzah|strong="H5798"\w* put \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* \add his hand\add* to the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and took \w hold|strong="H0270"\w* of it; for the \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w* \w shook|strong="H8058"\w* \add it\add*.\f + \fr 6.6 \ft Nachon: also called Chidon\f*\f + \fr 6.6 \ft shook it: or, stumbled\f*

And the \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* against \w Uzzah|strong="H5798"\w*; and \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him there for \add his\add* \w error|strong="H7944"\w*; and there he \w died|strong="H4191"\w* by the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 6.7 \ft error: or, rashness\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* was \w displeased|strong="H2734"\w*, because the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w made|strong="H6555"\w* a \w breach|strong="H6556"\w* upon \w Uzzah|strong="H5798"\w*: and he \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the name of the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w Perez-uzzah|strong="H6560"\w* to this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 6.8 \ft made: Heb. broken\f*\f + \fr 6.8 \ft Perez-uzzah: that is, the breach of Uzzah\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* was \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, How shall the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to me?

So \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not \w remove|strong="H5493"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto him into the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*: but \w David|strong="H1732"\w* carried it \w aside|strong="H5186"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Obed-edom|strong="H5654"\w* the \w Gittite|strong="H1663"\w*.

And the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w continued|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Obed-edom|strong="H5654"\w* the \w Gittite|strong="H1663"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w*: and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w Obed-edom|strong="H5654"\w*, and all his \w household|strong="H1004"\w*.

¶ And it was \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Obed-edom|strong="H5654"\w*, and all that \add pertaineth\add* unto him, because of the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. So \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* from the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Obed-edom|strong="H5654"\w* into the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* with \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*.

And it was \add so\add*, that when they that \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w gone|strong="H6805"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w paces|strong="H6806"\w*, he \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* \w oxen|strong="H7794"\w* and \w fatlings|strong="H4806"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w danced|strong="H3769"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* with all \add his\add* \w might|strong="H5797"\w*; and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \add was\add* \w girded|strong="H2296"\w* with a \w linen|strong="H0906"\w* \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*.

So \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* with \w shouting|strong="H8643"\w*, and with the \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*.

And as the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w Michal|strong="H4324"\w* \w Saul’s|strong="H7586"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w looked|strong="H8259"\w* through a \w window|strong="H2474"\w*, and \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w leaping|strong="H6339"\w* and \w dancing|strong="H3769"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and she \w despised|strong="H0959"\w* him in her \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

¶ And they \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* in the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w set|strong="H3322"\w* it in his \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* that \w David|strong="H1732"\w* had \w pitched|strong="H5186"\w* for it: and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* and peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 6.17  t pitched: Heb. stretched *

And as soon as \w David|strong="H1732"\w* had made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of \w offering|strong="H5927"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* and peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, he \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

And he \w dealt|strong="H2505"\w* among all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \add even\add* among the whole \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, as well to the \w women|strong="H0802"\w* as \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, to every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w cake|strong="H2471"\w* of \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, and a good \w piece|strong="H0829"\w* \add of flesh\add*, and a \w flagon|strong="H0809"\w* \add of wine\add*. So all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w departed|strong="H3212"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

¶ Then \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* his \w household|strong="H1004"\w*. And \w Michal|strong="H4324"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, How \w glorious|strong="H3513"\w* was the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, who \w uncovered|strong="H1540"\w* himself to \w day|strong="H3117"\w* in the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w handmaids|strong="H0519"\w* of his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, as \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the vain \w fellows|strong="H7386"\w* \w shamelessly|strong="H1540"\w* \w uncovereth|strong="H1540"\w* himself!\f + \fr 6.20 \ft shamelessly: or, openly\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Michal|strong="H4324"\w*, \add It was\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, which \w chose|strong="H0977"\w* me before thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and before all his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, to \w appoint|strong="H6680"\w* me \w ruler|strong="H5057"\w* over the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: therefore will I \w play|strong="H7832"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And I will yet be more \w vile|strong="H7043"\w* than \w thus|strong="H2063"\w*, and will be \w base|strong="H8217"\w* in mine own \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*: and of the \w maidservants|strong="H0519"\w* which thou hast \w spoken|strong="H0559"\w* of, of them shall I be had in \w honour|strong="H3513"\w*.\f + \fr 6.22 \ft of the…: or, of the handmaids of my servants\f*

Therefore \w Michal|strong="H4324"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* had no \w child|strong="H2056"\w* unto the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of her \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.
